oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Peter Culberson, his children, and grandchildren
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photo of Peter Culberson (1833-1900). He served in the Union army, 3rd Regiment, Tennessee Volunteer Cavalry. Was a prisoner of war in Cahawba, Alabama. He served tfrom April 1863 to June 1865. Culberson was from McMinn County, Tennessee. Back row L-R: Mary, Annis. Middle row L-R: Caroline and Pete. Front row L-R: Ethel (little girl). Photograph on the back of a postcard.
